title: Katie Price and Kris Boyson 'have huge row' over her wild night out with ex Dane Bowers
text:

Katie Price has reportedly had a huge argument with Kris Boyson over her wild night out with ex-boyfriend Dane Bowers.

The former glamour girl, 41, was pictured hanging out at a club in London last week with Another Level star Dane, who she dated fro 1998 until 2000.

During the night, she was seen knocking back drinks and chatting with a number of men before stumbling off home.

Now, The Sun Online reports her partying has caused tensions with her on/off boyfriend Kris.

A source said: "After everything that's happened recently you could understand why he's touchy about it.

"He confronted her and she kicked off, saying he can't tell her who she can and can't see - Dane's an old friend and it's nothing to do with Kris.

"But he doesn't want to be made a mug of again."

Katie was caught cheating on Kris over the summer when she jetted off to Turkey with a new toy boy, hunky young builder Charles Drury.

Mirror Online exclusively revealed Katie dumped Kris by text, but they now appear to be giving their romance another go.

However, there's already been a bumpy start after Katie slammed all of her exes for using her to gain Instagram followers.

In a YouTube video, she said: "Looking at my exes, who they were before they met me and what they did.

(Image: Instagram)

"So now, they’re not with me and the difference of their lives.

"They have become Mr Price’s, tried to be famous, end up getting Instagram posts off the back of me, getting all jobs from me and being able to earn money from stories and all that with always mentioning my name."

Katie's clip did not sit well with Kris, who took to the comments with a scorching comeback, defending himself as a "respectful gentleman" who would "never become a Mr Price".

description: Former glamour girl Katie Price has reportedly fought with her on/off boyfriend Kris Boyson over her recent night out with Dane Bowers
